title: Base permissible FSI :- It is the FSI that is otherwise permissible on any land with respect to zone shown as per the sanctioned development plan and the relevant provision of the Principal DCPR excluding the TDR and the premium FSI, redevelopment incentive FSI that can be received
clause_text: Base permissible FSI :- It is the FSI that is otherwise permissible on any land with respect to zone shown as per the sanctioned development plan and the relevant provision of the Principal DCPR excluding the TDR and the premium FSI, redevelopment incentive FSI that can be received.
